mroot.note: form a radical with specified index

merror.note: enclose a syntax error message from a preprocessor

mphantom.note: make content invisible but preserve its size

mfenced.note: surround content with a pair of fences

menclose.note: enclose content with a stretching symbol such as a long division sign.

msub.note: attach a subscript to a base

msup.note: attach a superscript to a base

msubsup.note: attach a subscript-superscript pair to a base

munder.note: attach an underscript to a base

mover.note: attach an overscript to a base

munderover.note: attach an underscript-overscript pair to a base

mmultiscripts.note: attach prescripts and tensor indices to a base

mlabeledtr.note: row in a table or matrix with a label or equation number

mtr.note: row in a table or matrix

mtd.note: one entry in a table or matrix

mlongdiv.note: similar to msgroup, with the addition of a divisor and result

msgroup.note: a group of rows in an mstack that are shifted by similar amounts

mscarries.note: row in an mstack that whose contents represent carries or borrows
